attributes.action: Do something about the quality of cookery lessons in our schools!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children at secondary school are no longer being taught practical cookery lessons. They are not taught how to cook meals from scratch or how to bake,instead they are shown how to fry some mince/chicken,open a jar or packet,and  boil some spaghetti!  

There is concern about obesity in children so why is there not a bigger drive to teach them how to cook healthy and nutritious food in school.
